title: How to get photos from Pixel phone onto Windows 10 computer
content:
I have connected the phone to the computer and attempted to import using the photos application on the Windows computer.  I receive the message "We can't find any photos or videos on your device. Add some and try again". What is the cause of this? I have no problems importing photos from my Huawei phone but the camera is better in the Pixel so I would rather use it.

I am surprised that I have to ask a question on a forum just to learn how to perform a simple task like transferring photos from a common phone. Another reason to hate Google.
